sources.title: Clown | Full Movie | Horror Thriller | Killer Clown!
sources.description:
Clown - A group of teens fights for their lives as they find themselves trapped in a fun-house, stalked by a killer clown who won't rest until every last one of them is dead.
2019. Stars: Adam Elshar, Dave Klec, Micavrie Amaia

metadata.Plot: A little boy's birthday party gets ruined when his entertainment (clown) cancels. His father finds a clown suit and becomes the new entertainment but something is weird about it, there is an evil curse and it won't come off. He specializes in eating little kids... everything after that goes down hill.
metadata.Actors: Andy Powers, Laura Allen, Peter Stormare
